It has never been easy to be an Afghan filmmaker.

The Afghan archivists had managed to save 7,000 movies totalling up to 32,000 hours of 16mm film and 8,000 hours of 35mm film. | 
@Plebeian42
Afghan Filmmakers Fear For Their Lives â€“ and for the Safety of the Archives
